title: Inside the Artificial Intelligence Arms Race That Will Reshape Elite Racing and Training
content:
'It's in the process of being transformative': UAE Emirates is leading the WorldTour's race to decipher its data with an AI bot that could accelerate strategy decisions and open doors to 'micro-training'.

Read the full article at Inside the Artificial Intelligence Arms Race That Will Reshape Elite Racing and Training on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
